name: Gone Viral (itch) (CandyAngelo)
description:
A Unreal Engine test game to learn the engine. Made for the Midsummer Game Jam 2019

Controls:

 - Keyboard -

  • WASD - Movement
  • F - Attack

- Gamepad - (Xbox One Controller) 

  • Left Thumbstick - Movement
  • A Button - Attack

- Gamepad - (PS4 Controller) 

  • Left Thumbstick - Movement
  • X Button - Attack
Team Members: 
  • Angelo Paonessa
  • Corry Young
  • Daniel Boyd
  • David Burdett
  • Jamie Brannan
  • Keith Nimmo
